layer5.evalCorpus.name: Ground Truth Evaluation Corpus (Machine-Verifiable)
layer5.evalCorpus.target: 5+ EXTERNAL repos (not AI-generated), AST-extracted facts, citation verification
layer5.evalCorpus.note: CRITICAL: Current synthetic repos are INVALID - circular evaluation. Must use real external repos.
layer5.evalCorpus.requiredFix: Clone real GitHub repos post-2024, extract facts via AST, do NOT use AI-generated repos

layer5.externalRepos.name: External Real Repos
layer5.externalRepos.target: 5+ real GitHub repos (not AI-generated, post-2024 or obscure)
layer5.externalRepos.note: eval-corpus/repos/* have no git remotes. WU-801-REAL queued after Phase 10 core work.
layer5.externalRepos.verification: Each repo must have: git remote -v showing real origin
